title: About me
text:
I am a PhD student in the Department of Political Science, Aarhus University in Denmark.
On this website, you can find an overview of my working papers and other projects as well as a list of my teaching and other professional experience.

title: Teaching and background
text:
Instructor in Public Policy (spring 2022)
Course convener in Comparative Climate Politics (spring 2024)
